info.title: igt-public-api-v1
info.description:
This specification contains V1 version of merged publicly exposed Anywhere API and PlayDigital API

To avoid name clash in schemas section duplicated objects in PlayDigital API were prefixed with interactive

For example interactiveErrorDTO

get.description:

put.description:
Returns a new refresh token when passed an existing one.
The following attribute should be populated in the TokenDTO.
siteId, token, clientId
The method will return a pair of new tokens.
Error Codes: INVALID_REFRESH_TOKEN INVALID_CLIENT_ID TOKEN_LIMIT_EXCEEDED

schema.description: Encapsulates the details for an OAuth token, contains both the data required to use a token and to create one.

post.description:
Returns an OAuth token from a one-time authCode.
The following attribute should be populated in the TokenDTO.
authCode, scope, clientId, clientCredentials
The method will return two tokens: an access token and a refresh token.
Error Codes: NOT_AUTHORIZED INVALID_CLIENT_ID TOKEN_LIMIT_EXCEEDED

schema.description: Encapsulates the details for an OAuth token, contains both the data required to use a token and to create one.

delete.description:
Delete a token if the OAuth server supports it.

Error Codes:
TOKEN_NULL_OR_EMPTY

post.description:
Returns OAuth tokens or authorization code if the player's credentials are correct. The following attribute should be populated in the TokenDTO.
clientId, resourceOwnerCredentials
The method will return a single TokenDTO with the authCode, or if an implicit grant is allowed, the method will return two tokens: an access token and a refresh token.
Error Codes: 7 TC_NOT_ACCEPTED 3 PLAYER_NOT_FOUND 4 PLAYER_NOT_ACTIVE 5 INCORRECT_X_DEVICE_NAME_HEADER -1 GENERIC_ERROR 1 SESSION_LIMITS_EXCEEDED INVALID_CLIENT_ID 6 PLAYER_BLACKLISTED 8 PLAYER_LOCKED 9 PLAYER_UNDERGOING_CLOSURE_PROCESS TOKEN_LIMIT_EXCEEDED

get.description:
Gets draws filtering by game-names. There are 4 times of searches:
  • Current open draws: when no parameters are informed except game-names, size and lang
  • Date span search: when date-from and date-to are both informed. It returns the draws between the dates informed
  • Day offset: when previous-days and next-days are both informed. It returns the draws between the offset informed where current date is the reference date
  • Draw offset: when previous-draws and next-draws are both informed. It returns the draws between the offset informed where current open draw is the reference draw. This search should be restricted to a single game since draws for different games might be different.
Error Codes: VALIDATION_ERROR

parameters.name: game-names
parameters.description: List of game names as comma separated values. If not informed all draws for all games will be returned

parameters.name: date-from
parameters.description: Format - int64. Starting date to be used by date span draw searches (date-to has to be informed as well)

parameters.name: date-to
parameters.description: Format - int64. Ending date to be used by date span draw searches (date-from has to be informed as well)

parameters.name: previous-days
parameters.description: Format - int32. Amount of previous days from today to be used by day offset searches (next-days has to be informed as well)

parameters.name: next-days
parameters.description: Format - int32. Amount of next days from today to be used by day offset searches (previous-days has to be informed as well)

parameters.name: previous-draws
parameters.description: Format - int32. Amount of previous draws from current open draw to be used by draw offset searches (next-draws has to be informed as well)

parameters.name: next-draws
parameters.description: Format - int32. Amount of next draws from current open draw to be used by draw offset searches (previous-draws has to be informed as well)

parameters.name: start-draw
parameters.description: Format - int32. Starting draw number

parameters.name: end-draw
parameters.description: Format - int32. Ending draw number

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Draw status to restrict results to

parameters.description: Format - int32. Size of the elements in the page to be returned

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language in which to return names

parameters.name: selections
parameters.description: A comma separated list of winning selections to be used to filter draw result searches

parameters.name: secondary-selections
parameters.description: A comma separated list of winning secondary selections to be used to filter draw result searches

parameters.name: bet-type
parameters.description: The bet type to used to filter draw results searches, along with selections

parameters.name: exclude-prize-tiers
parameters.description: If true, do not include prize tier information in response

get.description:
Gets draws filtering by game-names. There are 4 times of searches:
  • Current open draws: when no parameters are informed except game-names, size and lang
  • Date span search: when date-from and date-to are both informed. It returns the draws between the dates informed
  • Day offset: when previous-days and next-days are both informed. It returns the draws between the offset informed where current date is the reference date
  • Draw offset: when previous-draws and next-draws are both informed. It returns the draws between the offset informed where current open draw is the reference draw. This search should be restricted to a single game since draws for different games might be different.
Supports pagination Error Codes: VALIDATION_ERROR

get.description: Returns a list of game summaries.

parameters.name: query-type
parameters.description:
type of query to execute.  Valid values are BY_GAME_ID_RANGE, BY_LAUNCH_DATE_RANGE, 
 BY_START_DISTRIBUTION_DATE_RANGE, BY_END_DISTRIBUTION_DATE_RANGE, BY_DISABLED_DATE_RANGE,
 BY_PRICE_POINT_RANGE, and BY_REMAINING_PAYOUTS.  If the queryType parameter is not provided, then
 the game summary for all available games will be returned.

parameters.name: game-id-from
parameters.description:
Format - int32. start game id for the BY_GAME_ID_RANGE search.  If the gameIdFrom parameter is 
 not provided for the BY_GAME_ID_RANGE search, then the lowest game id available will be used.

parameters.name: game-id-to
parameters.description:
Format - int32. end game id for the BY_GAME_ID_RANGE search.  If the gameIdTo parameter is 
 not provided for the BY_GAME_ID_RANGE search, then the highest game id available will be used.

parameters.name: date-from
parameters.description:
Format - int64. start date for the BY_LAUNCH_DATE_RANGE, BY_START_DISTRIBUTION_DATE_RANGE, 
 BY_END_DISTRIBUTION_DATE_RANGE, or BY_DISABLED_DATE_RANGE search.  If the dateFrom parameter is 
 not provided for the date search, then the lowest date available will be used.

parameters.name: date-to
parameters.description:
Format - int64. end date for the BY_LAUNCH_DATE_RANGE, BY_START_DISTRIBUTION_DATE_RANGE, 
 BY_END_DISTRIBUTION_DATE_RANGE, or BY_DISABLED_DATE_RANGE search.  If the dateTo parameter is 
 not provided for the date search, then the highest date available will be used.

parameters.name: amount-from
parameters.description:
Format - int64. start amount for the BY_PRICE_POINT_RANGE or BY_REMAINING_PAYOUTS search.
 If the amountFrom parameter is not provided for the amount search, then the lowest amount available
 will be used.

parameters.name: amount-to
parameters.description:
Format - int64. end amount for the BY_PRICE_POINT_RANGE or BY_REMAINING_PAYOUTS search. If the 
 amountTo parameter is not provided for the amount search, then the highest amount available
 will be used.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Format - int32. number of results to be returned
